name: The Final Voyage
description:
Francis Bonny,  an old pirate, is out on his last voyage to find the biggest treasure of his life. 

Francis soon realizes that his journey to the treasure isn't going to be easy when he arrives in the mysterious floating islands. He follows the gold coins that he believes that it would lead him to the treasure box. The only problem is that he is faced with mysterious terrain, traps and holes placed by someone who doesn't want Francis in the island.

The level design was done by Chae Lee (Me) and the art asset used in the game were Kenny Pirate Kit and Kenny Platformer kit. The Skybox was from 8k Skybox pack by BG Studios

https://kenney.nl/assets

https://assetstore.unity.com/?price=0-0&q=skybox&orderBy=0

FEATURES:

-Gold coins that may lead Francis to the treasure

-Odd shaped terrain

-Traps placed by unknown person (Or is it a person?)
